record.dc:title: 137BY13 Ledford Island, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 16BY55, an adult female with hairpin (F.S. 1252) under skull. Square 8R16. Direction South.
record.wpa:narrative: Adult female in fair condition, extended on back with head to SW. Pit filled with mottled humus and clay. Strip of rotten wood about 0.6' above right leg lay parallel to long axis of skeleton. Phalanges of feet and hands and patellae had been slightly disturbed, apparently by roots and rodents.
